text:
While people of color are disproportionately affected in severe #COVID19 disease, many remain hesitant about getting the #vaccine.

As a Black physician, @ECUBrodySOM's Dr. @CedricMBrightMD fact-checks vaccine myths in this episode of #TalkLikeAPirate ➡️ https://t.co/CyV9QpWtdB https://t.co/7wa7x1pBoi
